response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards and offers unparalleled benefits. Given its quality and unique features, I believe it's worth more than its face value. To ensure we both benefit from this transaction, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire it for an exclusive price of $12,000. This special offer reflects my confidence in the product's value and my desire to see it go to someone who will appreciate it fully. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.", "product_price": 12000}
